glosses: a male given name from Arabic, equivalent to English Joseph

etymology:
Etymology tree
Biblical Hebrew הוֹסִיף (hosíf)der.
Biblical Hebrew יוֹסֵף (yōsép)bor.
Arabic يُوسُف (yūsuf)bor.
Ottoman Turkish یوسف (yusuf)
Turkish Yusuf
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish یوسف (yusuf), borrowed from Arabic يُوسُف (yūsuf), borrowed from Biblical Hebrew יוֹסֵף (yōsép), from הוֹסִיף (hosíf, “to add”).
